text: I use the default 16px as my base. And I explicitly call it out on the body element

The issue most people have with em is the fact that its a multiplier of its parents. This screws with some people. Rems work directly from the body. Some people feel they are no better than pixels but if i use rem on my font then all i have to do is change the body font siz to see a marked increase or decrease of font size site wide.
Yea i have no issue with using the units, just didnt seem like ems were a good unit for media queries. Theyre awesome for font sizes
